credit_line: Gift of Ruth Friedman in memory of Harry G. Friedman
dimensions:
H x diam.: 30.1 x 1 cm (11 7/8 x 3/8 in.)
diam. (top): 4 cm (11 7/8 x 1 9/16 in.)
title: Torah pointer
description: In silver, round shaft with upper half spirally turned, lower half plain.  Finial of four curved strips, each with two applied oak leaves, encircling sphere on shaft and capped by small scallop-edged finial with little knob on top.  Pointer is right hand with middle finger extended and banding above wrist.
name: Torah pointer
